      • getItem

        @RequestMapping(value="{subcategory}/{itemid}",
                method=GET)
public RestItemObject getItem(@PathVariable(value="subcategory")
                                    java.lang.String subcategory,
                                    @PathVariable(value="itemid")
                                    java.lang.Long itemId)
                       throws WrongItemSubCategoryRequestException
        Get an item by its id. Asks for subCategory to avoid "cheating" by increasing id search.
        Throws:
        WrongItemSubCategoryRequestException
